readable.title: 2508249781_36e9282423
readable.content: A woman wearing a straw hat and floral skirt is sitting on cement stairs with her head in her hands . A woman with a straw hat is sitting on steps outdoors . The girl wearing the straw hat is sitting on the concrete steps . The woman sits on the steps outside . The woman wearing a dress and hat , sits on the steps , with her head on her hands .
